attributes.action: Stop Nicola Sturgeon from demanding another Scottish Independence Referendum.
attributes.background: Nicola Sturgeon is threatening another Scottish Independence referendum even though 2 million Scots democratically voted NO to independence in 2014. Let's stop her threats, respect the will of the British people, prevent more division and unite for a stronger country.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134361
